full_output.summary: I am an aspiring full-stack developer seeking a position within a well-established IT company. I am eager to collaborate on cutting-edge technologies and engage in challenging projects with diverse scopes. My goal is to contribute to innovative solutions and grow within a dynamic and supportive team environment.

projects.name: Spotify Clone
projects.description: Developed a responsive and interactive Spotify clone that allows users to play songs stored in different playlists. Each playlist on the site corresponds to a specific folder of songs.

projects.name: Password-generator
projects.description: Developed a password generator website using React that allows users to create unique passwords with customizable options.

projects.name: My portfolio website
projects.description: Developed a responsive and attractive portfolio website to showcase my work and skills. Integrated a contact form that saves user messages directly to Google Docs for efficient communication.

projects.name: To-do list
projects.description: Created a to-do list creator website that provides several features to interact with the tasks. Used concept of context-api for a more efficient approach.

full_output.name: Sumit Saini
